content.description:
CHURCH ATTENDANCE IN THE UNITED STATES, 1972-2010

Source: General Social Survey, 2010.
content.question: Based on the line graph, which of the following statements about church attendance in 1972 is true?

choices.label: In 1972, about 30% of people surveyed reported attending church monthly or less.
In 1972, more people surveyed reported attending church weekly than reported attending rarely or never.
In 1972, most people surveyed reported attending church yearly.
In 1972, more people surveyed reported attending church yearly than reported attending weekly.

content.answer: In 1972, more people surveyed reported attending church weekly than reported attending rarely or never.
